meaningMnemonic: You put <radical>flowers</radical> on your <radical>car</radical> and your <radical>scooter</radical>. The flowers you put on them are <kanji>lotus</kanji> flowers.
readingMnemonic: You're putting a <kanji>lotus</kanji> on both your scooter and car because they are <reading>ren</reading>tals (れん).
